snippet: Looking at the words The Times has used in its articles over the past 18 or so years, "lifestyle" and "diet" are apparently more popular themes than "spirituality" or "longevity." But "olive oil" is on the rise.
abstract: Looking at the words The Times has used in its articles over the past 18 or so years, "lifestyle" and "diet" are apparently more popular themes than "spirituality" or "longevity." But "olive oil" is on the rise.

headline.main: Does Lifestyle Trump Living a Long Life?
